results.title: Metformin attenuates renal tubulointerstitial fibrosis via upgrading autophagy in the early stage of diabetic nephropathy
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_162000</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:162000 @@@renal tubulointerstitial fibrosis@@@ via upgrading autophagy in the early stage of @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@

results.title: A novel HNF1B mutation p.R177Q in autosomal dominant tubulointerstitial kidney disease and maturity-onset diabetes of the young type 5
results.text_hl: The proband was administered @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ at a dose of 500 mg/day.
